meanings.definition: A person or thing that digests.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a fast digester, always finishing meals quickly.
meanings.sent2: The stomach and intestines are important digesters in the body.
meanings.sent3: The little robot was programmed to be a super digester, eating up all the data in its path.
meanings.sent4: Her brain was like a powerful digester, processing information at lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The vacuum cleaner worked like a diligent digester, sucking up all the dirt on the floor.

meanings.definition: A vessel or container in which organic matter is decomposed by bacteria.
meanings.sent1: The farm had large digesters to break down waste into useful compost.
meanings.sent2: The biogas plant used digesters to produce energy from organic waste.
meanings.sent3: The compost digester had a party with all the bacteria, breaking down the food scraps.
meanings.sent4: The digester hummed with activity as the bacteria worked their magic on the organic material.
meanings.sent5: The giant digester towered over the farm, churning out nutrient-rich soil for the crops.
